changed.asset_errors_wsnotexist_text: The webservice '$1' doesn't exist. Please contact your administrator.
changed.asset_errors_vendors_active: Cannot update $1 because its products are in use by active assets.
changed.asset_errors_products_active: Cannot update $1 because it is in use by active assets.
changed.asset_errors_versions_active: Cannot update $1 because it is in use by active assets.
changed.asset_errors_vendors_cascademin: To update $1 we also need to update its products and versions. Continue ?
changed.asset_errors_products_cascademin: To update $1 we also need to update its vendor and versions. Continue ?
changed.asset_errors_versions_cascademin: To update $1 we also need to update its vendor and product. Continue ?
changed.asset_errors_vendors_cascademax: Update all the $1 products and versions at the same time ?
changed.asset_errors_products_cascademax: Update all the $1 versions at the same time ?

added.asset_errors_concurrency_text:
Operation refused: you're not allowed to finalize this operation because the selected object has been updated by another user.
Refresh the principal screen to update the selected object before start again the operation.
added.asset_error_concurrency_text:
The item '$1' has been already updated by an other user.
Click on the Refresh button to update it.
You'll have to relaunch your operation after that.
